      • Player

        public Player(double x,
              double y,
              double z,
              GameCamera gameCamera,
              EntityManager entityManager,
              javafx.scene.PointLight light)
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of player
        y - y coordinate of player
        z - z coordinate of player
        gameCamera - GameCamera object used for player sight
        entityManager - entityManager object which updates many of the player fields as the game runs
        light - The light that emanates from the player
